title-group.article-title: Customer Satisfaction in CALL: Queries from the Users and Our Final Impact

abstract.p: CALL is one of the many forms of applied science. Our research must lead to products and our aim is for these products to be used. It thus raises not only questions in the field of linguistics and informatics, but also pedagogical and commercial issues. I would like to address this last issues from the viewpoint of the customer of CALL, the one who purchases our product and is supposed to use it to learn another language.
